originalText.text: Dr. Pal is wonderful. Her exam was so thorough, and she patiently answered all of my questions.  I have not had a doctor give me such time and attention in years. Highly recommend.

text.text: Dr. Pal is wonderful. Her exam was so thorough, and she patiently answered all of my questions.  I have not had a doctor give me such time and attention in years. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: Doctor Carmen Pal , is highly recommended by me . My husband and I have been her patients for many years , she is very thorough she takes her time to explain any findings she may have , and gives you the opportunity to ask any questions . She’s very courteous and patient . We saw her just a week ago . She’s a pleasure to have as an endocrinologist .

originalText.text: Able to make convenient front desk appointments after meeting with the Dr; check-in and wait time for Dr's aid do pre check-up followed by seeing Dr was done quickly. Everyone was friendly, respectful and professional. Office, overall was comfortable and clean.

originalText.text:
Dr. Pal is amazing. She is a real professional, listens to her patients and I feel she takes me serious.

I love how strict she is, she's a great doctor, not easy to find these days. Keep up the great work Dr. Pal!

originalText.text: Dr. Carmen Pal is the best endocrinologist I have seen. She is nice and listens to your questions and concerns. I have Type 1 diabetes and my blood sugar went from 288 to 209 in just 2 weeks. It is very hard to find a good endocrinologist out there but Dr. Carmen Pal is the best doctor I've seen.
